name: elabgOLD
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cab(s0, w0)), w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cab(s0, w0)), w1))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cab(s0, w0)), w1))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cab(s0, w0)), w1))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cab(s0, w0)), w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Obsolete version of ~ elabg as of 23-Nov-2022. Membership in a class abstraction, using implicit substitution. Compare Theorem 6.13 of [Quine] p. 44. (Contributed by NM, 14-Apr-1995.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
